content: this knitted spencer with a classic cable pattern is a true must-have knitted with durable norwool plus it feels wonderfully soft while the wool blend provides warmth comfort and excellent shape retention the timeless cable pattern gives the spencer a handcrafted and stylish look perfect to wear over a blouse or shirt for a casual outfit but just as beautiful as an extra layer on colder days thanks to the sturdy yet supple yarn the spencer keeps its shape and appearance even with frequent wear yarn durable norwool plus 40% acrylic 40% polyamide 20% superwash wool 100g/160m design kristina de barse
